  • Uses of Piece in hw3

    Classes in hw3 that implement Piece
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    AbstractPiece
    Abstract superclass for implementations of the Piece interface.
    class 
    CornerPiece
    Piece type with a 2 x 2 bounding square and initial cell positions (0, 0), (1, 0), and (1, 1) in that order.
    class 
    DiagonalPiece
    Piece type that has a 2 x 2 bounding square with the icons at (0, 0) and, (1, 1), in that order.
    class 
    IPiece
    Piece type that has a 3 x 3 bounding square with the icons down the center in the order (0, 1), (1, 1), and (2, 1).
    class 
    LPiece
    Piece type that has a 3 x 3 bounding square with the icons at (0, 0), (0, 1), (1, 1), and (2, 1), in that order.
    class 
    SnakePiece
    Piece type with a 3 x 3 bounding square and initial cell positions (0, 0), (1, 0), (1, 1), and (1, 2) in that order.
